description:
In the first match of the summer tournament against the Tanikawa Eagles, the Mifune Dolphins keep a 4 point lead all the way to the final innings.
Urabe and catcher Andy are doing the brunt of the work, fueled by their desire to win their way up the tournament in order to get revenge on the Touto Boys, the team they once belonged to.
The outfielders are also giving everything to protect their lead, but in the last inning, Urabe seems to have finally run out of stamina...
Source: crunchyroll
